channel.title: Dadmother - Mélodie de Marais (swamp music/bluegrass)
channel.description: Finally fished up this really fun track! I was inspired by the idea of Cajun life, and wanted to give a kind of sonic representation of having a “fais do-do” (a Cajun dance party) in the middle of the swamp. Of course, feedback is always welcome. I hope you enjoy! https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/me-lodie-de-marais/s-8mTxK ![image|690x430](upload://1sEWzev5tiNG0mMNykGLA65QpUN.jpeg)

item.title: Dadmother - Mélodie de Marais (swamp music/bluegrass)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Jeez, thank you so much for the kind words Auxy has proven to have such diverse possibilities, and I’m just thankful to have a medium in which to express them.

DUDE, MAKE SOME CELTIC GOODNESS. I am all for stuff like that. If you tinker with Wire a little bit, you might be able to get a quasi-fiddle sound! It’s got some good attack on it, so maybe? Either way, thank you so much for the kind words, and I’m stoked to hear it in the future, yo!

Read full topic

item.title: Dadmother - Mélodie de Marais (swamp music/bluegrass)
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
You’re really pushing Auxy’s boundaries, my dude!

It’s cool to see genres that are nowhere near house or future bass or even electronic in Auxy. I mean, hell, I’m gonna do some frickin’ Irish music down the road, fiddles (really, violins, since we don’t actually have a fiddle) and all!

Now if only I had me an accordion instrument…!

Read full topic

item.title: Dadmother - Mélodie de Marais (swamp music/bluegrass)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Finally fished up this really fun track! I was inspired by the idea of Cajun life, and wanted to give a kind of sonic representation of having a “fais do-do” (a Cajun dance party) in the middle of the swamp. Of course, feedback is always welcome. I hope you enjoy!
